ACCEPTED.title: Accepted
ACCEPTED.description: The permission request was accepted by the user and is being processed.

WAITING_FOR_START.title: Waiting for Start
WAITING_FOR_START.description: The permission request was accepted and is scheduled to start at the specified start time.

STREAMING_DATA.title: Streaming Data
STREAMING_DATA.description: The permission request was accepted and data is now actively streamed to the eligible party.

REJECTED.title: Rejected
REJECTED.description: The user rejected the permission request.

REVOCATION_RECEIVED.title: Revocation Received
REVOCATION_RECEIVED.description: The user requested revocation of the permission.

TERMINATED.title: Terminated
TERMINATED.description: The permission was terminated by the eligible party.

FULFILLED.title: Fulfilled
FULFILLED.description: The expiration time of the permission was reached.

FAILED_TO_START.title: Failed to Start
FAILED_TO_START.description: An error occurred and the permission could not be started.
